content: color on 11th round still working as in round 2 and work a total of 10 rounds in your trim next color cream using 5mm hook and with right side facing join change color on the 21st round and work a total your trim color at the bottom corner of each of of 8 rounds in your third color pink chain your straps work in single_crochet around each side one fasten_off weave in all ends work in single_crochet for a total of 6 rounds fasten_off handle from your finishing join count back 6 stitches row 1-5 *chain 1 in -6 sts from the join single_crochet in those 6 and next 6 stitches 12 turn * repeat from * to * 12 row 6 chain 1 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 8 single_crochet decrease turn 10 row 7-10 *chain 1 single_crochet 10* turn repeat from * to * 10 row 11 chain 1 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 6 single_crochet decrease turn 8 row 12-25 *chain 1 single_crochet 8 turn * repeat from * to * if you want a shorter/longer handle work fewer/more row that indicated however keep in mind that when this bag is full the handle will strech significantly for the other side of the handle fold bag in half so that centre of the completed strap is at the fold find your middle stitch on the other side and count back 6 stitches from there work strap as indicated above sew or slip_stitch both sides together www mimimustknit ca © mylène lacroix 2016 3 pattern support mylene@mimimustknit ca patterns for personal use only
